column5: Would like to stay here overnight and was wondering if anyone has any information on hotels/motels. Thanks for the information.

Here are three that I checked on: Best Western Airport Motor Inn, 807-229-1213 Peninsula Inn 807-229-0651 Heritage Inn 807-229-1234 I never stayed in this area but will be staying at the Best Western in late August. If you do a search on each of these places you can get more information.
